org.apache.zookeeper.test

Class QuorumUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zookeeper.test.QuorumUtil

  • public class QuorumUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for quorum testing. Setups 2n+1 peers and allows to start/stop all peers, particular peer, n peers etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Initializes 2n+1 quorum peers which will form a ZooKeeper ensemble.
